entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
